name: Tactics and Behavioral Traits
description: Recognizing the unique psychological and behavioral patterns of each type.

cards.title: Psychopathic Control Tactics
cards.description: How psychopaths use logic and detachment to dominate their targets.
bulletpoints: Psychopaths engineer social environments where they maintain absolute control.
They target high-value assets and relationships for long-term strategic manipulation.
Their ability to mask emotions makes them nearly undetectable in professional settings.

cards.title: Sociopathic Outbursts and Unpredictability
cards.description: Understanding how sociopaths use intimidation and aggression as weapons.
bulletpoints: Sociopaths rely on fear and immediate dominance to maintain control.
They use reckless, violent behavior as a psychological deterrent.
Their inability to control impulses makes them susceptible to exposure through self-destruction.

cards.title: The Narcissist’s Social Warfare
cards.description: How narcissists manipulate groups and social environments for control.
bulletpoints: Narcissists rely on triangulation—pitting people against each other to maintain dominance.
They play the victim to gain sympathy and social reinforcement.
Exposing their contradictions in front of an audience is an effective way to neutralize their power.
